item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 movie second trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/sonic-the-hedgehog-3-movie-second-trailer

In theaters on December 20.

Paramount Pictures has released the second official trailer for the Sonic the Hedgehog 3 movie, which will premiere in theaters on December 20.

Here is the story synopsis, via the movie’s official website:

Sonic the Hedgehog returns to the big screen this holiday season in his most thrilling adventure yet. Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet.

Director Jeff Fowler returns along with our all-star cast including Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, James Marsden, Tika Sumpter, Idris Elba, Colleen O’Shaughnessey, Natasha Rothwell, Shemar Moore, Adam Pally, Lee Majdoub, newcomers Alyla Browne and Krysten Ritter, with Keanu Reeves joining the franchise as Shadow the Hedgehog.

Watch the trailer below.

Official Trailer #2

item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls character trailer – Mayuri Kurotsuchi
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/bleach-rebirth-of-souls-character-trailer-mayuri-kurotsuchi

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Captain of Squad 12.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft have released a new character trailer for fighting action game Bleach: Rebirth of Souls highlighting playable fighter Mayuri Kurotsuchi.

According to his description, Grimmjow is a proud warrior with an insatiable and inquisitive mind, who uses poison to wear down his enemies and control their movement across the battlefield.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam in early 2025.

Watch the trailer below.

Character Trailer: Mayuri Kurotsuchi
